trailingComments.value: * * Function intended for drawing dialogue / monologue (though it can be used for anything) * @param {object} context - Rendering context to draw on * @param {string[]} text - The array of lines to draw see: {@link eVN.NovelClass.VisualsClass.splitText}) * @param {object} textboxOptions - Should be eVNML.options.textbox, object containing textbox properties * @param {number} maxLines - Maximum amount of lines to draw at a time
var y = ctx.canvas.height - box.height - box.bottom + box.padding;
